cast.name: 肖娜·麦克唐纳德 Shauna MacDonald

introduction: Featuring luxury expedition ships all facing the same challenge: delivering on a perfect voyage while overcoming countless obstacles behind-the-scenes. It’s a see-all, hear-all journey through every moment above and below deck – from the mechanics of modern sea-going to the human dramas the seafarers and guest service staff face. From harrowing navigational challenges, to unforgettable sights and moments, MIGHTY CRUISE SHIPS promises an action-packed, eye-popping look at the high-wire balancing act of providing the vacation of a lifetime on the high-seas!Episodes include…Marco PoloStella AustralisCelebrity SolsticeAzamara JourneyLe SoléalPaul Gauguin
